channel.title: Help Pl0X
channel.description:
Yeah well i know most of you say google it and use the search bar.....and i have and what comes up on the search bar is helps. And what comes up on google is stuff for WOW.
[b]Now what i want to know is how to change item colours because ive tried everything i can[/b]. Sorry about all these posts its just i want to release my client/server as fast as i can.
Some stuff i haev tried is copying the bandos chest and posting it down the bottom of the file and changing its name and adding this to the end of the code [code] class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];//Start of new colors class8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133; //New color. [/code]
[b]And i would end up with something like this[/b] [code]if(i == 11111){class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";class8.anInt174 = 4681;class8.anInt181 = 984;class8.anInt190 = 500;class8.anInt204 = 0;class8.anInt198 = 2039;class8.anInt199 = 0;class8.anInt169 = 0;class8.anInt194 = 0;class8.anInt165 = 4682;class8.anInt200 = 4683;class8.anInt164 = 4685;class8.anInt188 = 4684;class8.anInt175 = -1;class8.aBoolean176 = false;class8.aString170 = "RDC Plate";class8.aByteArray178 = "RDC chestplate!!.".getBytes();class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];//Start of new colorsclass8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133; //New color.[/code]
}
Can someone help me out.

item.title: Help Pl0X
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Yeah well i know most of you say google it and use the search barâ€¦and i have and what comes up on the search bar is helps. And what comes up on google
is stuff for WOW.

Now what i want to know is how to change item colours because ive tried everything i can. Sorry about all these posts its just i want to release my client/server
as fast as i can.

Some stuff i haev tried is copying the bandos chest and posting it down the bottom of the file and changing its name and adding this to the end
of the code class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];//Start of new colors class8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133; //New color.

And i would end up with something like this

if(i == 11111){class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";class8.anInt174 = 4681;class8.anInt181 = 984;class8.anInt190 = 500;class8.anInt204 = 0;class8.anInt198 = 2039;class8.anInt199 = 0;class8.anInt169 = 0;class8.anInt194 = 0;class8.anInt165 = 4682;class8.anInt200 = 4683;class8.anInt164 = 4685;class8.anInt188 = 4684;class8.anInt175 = -1;class8.aBoolean176 = false;class8.aString170 = "RDC Plate";class8.aByteArray178 = "RDC chestplate!!.".getBytes();class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];//Start of new colorsclass8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133; //New color.

}

Can someone help me out.
